# Power BI For Data Analysis

## What is Power BI?
::: {.fragment .fade-up}
- A data visualization software
:::
::: {.fragment .fade-down}
- A Business Intelligence tool
:::
::: {.fragment .fade-up}
- Create Reports and Dashboards
:::


## Why Power BI?
::: {.fragment .fade-right}
- It's free and easy to use 
:::
::: {.fragment .fade-left}
- Can integrate with Office Products
:::
::: {.fragment .fade-right}
- Connect With various data sources
:::
::: {.fragment .fade-left}
- Share Reports and Collaborate with Others
:::
